name: K7 Breakout
description:
Short platformer created, in one week, for "Brackeys Jam 2020.2".

-

Fear alone made this cassette tape grow legs to escape the tray of a starving cassette player.

Collect pens to rewind your tape to gain some distance from the cassette player, and then use the scissors to cut yourself free!

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

W - Jump

Music: "Bush Week" by Nihilore/James Opie, http://www.nihilore.com/synthwave. License at Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license.
